content: कुटुंबं, कुटुंबकं {@--1@} A household, a family; उदारचरितानां तु वसुधैव कुटुंबकं <ls>H. 1. 70</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 45</ls>; <ls>Ms. 11. 12</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">22</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">8. 166.</ls> {@--2@} The duties and cares of a family; तदुपहितकुटुंबः <ls>R. 7. 71.</ls> --बः, --बं {@--1@} A kinsman, a relation by descent or marriage. {@--2@} Offspring, progeny. {@--3@} A name. {@--4@} Race. {@--5@} A group, collection; <ls>Vikr. 1. 92</ls>.
